Html:
Hi,

How do i know if the update in WSUS is updated after i revise it in WPP?

thanks
Double-click on the update, as if you want to revise it, and look if you see changes you have made.

For example I have make Patch A visible in wsus console. Then I revise Patch A in WPP. How will I know Patch A in wsus console is the latest patch that I have revise? Do I need to restart the sever again?

flarestar wrote:
For example I have make Patch A visible in wsus console. Then I revise Patch A in WPP. How will I know Patch A in wsus console is the latest patch that I have revise? >Do I need to restart the sever again?
In WSUS-Console you can get more details, right click on pane and select more Columns. Release Date and other columns. There you can see what the latest is.
No need to restart the server. It can take 10~20 seconds for the Wsus server to update his database. But the update is up to date nearly immediately. Clients can need more time to see the change.
